name: Light the Way Home
description:
Made for the Incremental game jam 2021.

Click in the world to place lights that scare off the monsters.

The building graphics are from opengameart.org, credit: Bleed -http://remusprites.carbonmade.com/

Some of the other sprites were taken from a game I made called Incremancer. And some were created just for this game.

Source code:

https://github.com/jamesmgittins/light-the-way-home
